title: Candy Man - The Man Who Killed Halloween
description:
Hi Friends!
Today's Murder, Mystery & Makeup story is about The Candyman, an awful human being, who really sucked. ALSO, there is another guy who was also named The Candyman , I'm sure people will let me know about that dude, he was somethinnnn else!
 Honestly, there wasn’t much background info on him nor many pictures of , much of anything. Do you believe the death penalty was a little much or no? I guess in the end, it doesn’t really matter because he is outta here.
RiP To poor Timothy, so young and taken for such selfish reasons.
Hope you have a wonderful day today, you make good choices and I will be seeing you very soon.
xo
Bailey Sarian

Watch the original video here and don't forget to subscribe to my YouTube @BaileySarian!
